movie.title: Trash
movie.writer: Felipe Braga (additional material), Richard Curtis (screenplay), Andy Mulligan (novel)
movie.actors: Rooney Mara, Martin Sheen, Wagner Moura, Christiane Amanpour
movie.plot: When two trash-picking boys from Rio's slums find a wallet in amongst the daily detritus of their local dump, little do they imagine that their lives are about to change forever. But when the local police show up, offering a handsome reward for the wallet's return, the boys, Rafael and Gardo, realize that what they've found must be important.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
